Posts.EditableText: Hi all, I am new to Quest and was wondering if it would be possible to use Quest to create a game based on the sport of team roping? Any advice is greatly appreciated.
Posts.HTML: Hi all, I am new to Quest and was wondering if it would be possible to use Quest to create a game based on the sport of team roping? Any advice is greatly appreciated.

Posts.EditableText:
You can make a game based on anything you want; it's all about what you can write.

The first question is if you know how you want the game to play. Break it down to what appears on the screen and what the player can do. How does the player interact with the game: Button presses, typing commands, or clicking links?
Once you've decided on that, then you're ready to start thinking about how Quest can implement it.
